welcome_message_body: Welcome to Singosari, Indonesia! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful temples, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Singosari has to offer.

restaurants.name: Depot 29
restaurants.description: Depot 29 is a indonesian restaurant located in Malang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Raya Randuagung No. 83 (Singosari), Malang, Jawa Timur
